ExampleDefinition.Description:
Using garish colors to demonstrate Xaml styling of the chart, Axis, grid lines, tick lines and common series types.
Almost any element in SciChart is stylable in Xaml and most parts of the chart are templated. You can easily set background, grid-line, axis label, viewport background and chart series colors in Xaml.
Take a look at the article on [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#Templating%20and%20Styling%20Chart%20Parts.html']Styling Axis Labels, Axis Titles, Rotating Axis Labels[/url] for further details.
